titles: An enquiry into four remarkable texts of the New Testament which contain some difficulty in them, with a probable resolution of them by John Edwards ...
author: Edwards, John, 1637-1716.
publisher: Printed by J. Hayes ... for W. Graves ...,
notes: The texts discussed are Matt. II, 23; I Corinth. XI, 14; I Corinth. XV, 29; and I Peter III, 19-20.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
